Class.ClassComment: Listenable /** * Interface that denotes that the implementation can have listeners attached to it. * @author Manik Surtani * @since 4.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Adds a listener to the component. Typically, listeners would need to be annotated with {@link Listener} andfurther to that, contain methods annotated appropriately, otherwise the listener will not be registered. <p/> See the {@link Listener} annotation for more information.<p/> * @param listener must not be null. */
/** * Removes a listener from the component. * @param listener listener to remove. Must not be null. */
